abstract: In the name of encouraging my kids to read, I dumped my iPad Kindle app and picked up some actual books.
snippet: In the name of encouraging my kids to read, I dumped my iPad Kindle app and picked up some actual books.
lead_paragraph: In the name of encouraging my kids to read, I've dumped my iPad's Kindle app.

headline.main: Putting Down the iPad So My Kids Can See Me Read
